nodes.text: Grand Champion of the Great Hunt

The Grand Champion of the Great Hunt was an honored position taken by bounty hunters by the time of the Cold War which was made by the Mandalorians. It signified elite warriors that had successfully completed the trials of the Great Hunt. Those inducted into their ranks were provided exclusive access to the Blacklist and typically always included a member of the Mandalorians. In the Cold War, Mandalore the Vindicated sat amongst the Grand Champions but passed his post to an unidentified bounty hunter that had completed the trials of the Great Hunt.
